subject: Testing a method that outputs a text file.
msgSnippet: Hi All, I ve got a class method that writes out a (text) file. Given a known input how can I test that the output is correct. I m using ANT to run my test
messageBody:
Hi All,

I've got a class method that writes out a (text) file.

Given a known input how can I test that the output is correct.

I'm using ANT to run my test cases.

John M
